title: How to Make Dairy Free Banana and Walnut Ice Cream

steps.headline: Pour ½ cup of almond milk into the blender.
steps.description: Blend the combo until they are smooth and creamy.

steps.headline: Add the tofu, agave nectar and salt to the creamy mixture.
Pour the walnuts into the mixture.
Whisk the nuts.
steps.description: This step is done when they appear evenly throughout the mixture.

steps.headline: Pour the mixture into the metal cake pan.
steps.description: Make sure the mixture is at an even level throughout the pan.

steps.headline: Place the pan in the freezer, uncovered.
Whisk the mixture every 30 minutes for a total of two hours.
steps.description: Whisking is to prevent the mixture from crystallizing.

steps.headline: After the last whisking, let the mixture sit in the freezer for 1 more hour.
When time is up, remove the pan from the freezer.
Scoop the desired amount of ice-cream into the desired dish, cup, cone etc.
Eat, enjoy and be blown away by this dairy-free delicious ice cream!

text: Peel the two bananas. Put them in the blender. Pour ½ cup of almond milk into the blender. Blend the combo until they are smooth and creamy. Add the tofu, agave nectar and salt to the creamy mixture. Blend until it becomes smooth. Pour the walnuts into the mixture.  Whisk the nuts. This step is done when they appear evenly throughout the mixture. Pour the mixture into the metal cake pan. Make sure the mixture is at an even level throughout the pan. Place the pan in the freezer, uncovered.  Whisk the mixture every 30 minutes for a total of two hours. Whisking is to prevent the mixture from crystallizing. After the last whisking, let the mixture sit in the freezer for 1 more hour. This allows it to set. When time is up, remove the pan from the freezer. Be prepared to serve. Scoop the desired amount of ice-cream into the desired dish, cup, cone etc. This recipe typically serves 6. Eat, enjoy and be blown away by this dairy-free delicious ice cream!
